title: William Wing Loring
description: William Wing Loring (1818-1886) was a career military officer who fought in the Florida Seminole Wars, the Mexican American War, the Civil War, and the Egyptian Ethiopian War. During his service to the Khedive, an occupation that lasted from 1869 to 1879, Loring was charged with maintaing Egypt's coastal defenses at Alexandria and Rosetta. This bio will change later, but is currently a placeholder while I gather more information...
subject: William Wing Loring
